snippet: Alpha, the 2012 Aiken-trained Horse of the Year, held off Flat Out by a head Saturday in the $750,000 Woodward Stakes at Saratoga Race Course in Saratoga Springs, N.Y.
abstract: Alpha, 2012 Aiken-trained Horse of the Year, wins the $750,000 Woodward Stakes at Saratoga Race Course in Saratoga Springs, NY.
lead_paragraph: Alpha, the 2012 Aiken-trained Horse of the Year, held off Flat Out by a head Saturday in the $750,000 Woodward Stakes at Saratoga Race Course in Saratoga Springs, N.Y.
